About Me

Intro

I'm a freelance web developer based in Maryland, U.S. Over the past year, I've been working on both small & large projects for clients.

BIO

I didn't always code, but I developed an interest turned into passion for building web applications since 2018. Along with being self-taught, I attended General Assembly (DC),
where I was enrolled in a full-time, immersive 12 week course.
This course gave me a diverse set of skills ranging from computer programming, web development, user experience design, all the way to data science, & product management.

General Assembly

Full-Stack Developer (2018)

I attended General Assembly (DC), a specialized coding bootcamp/school from October 2018 - February 2019.

Skills

Software

(Front-End): HTML5, CSS3, JS, JQuery, JSON, Reactjs, Gulp, Bootstrap, & ES5.
(Back-End): Node.js, Ruby, Express.js, Firebase, & SASS
